item.title: Presentation Articles
item.description: Please find a list of weekly seminar presentation articles below: Week 2 (September 15th): Quantification of Behaviour Article Link: Automated behavioural analysis reveals the basic behavioural repertoire of the urochordate Ciona intestinalis pdf Download Week 3 (September 22nd): Pharmacology Article Link: Activation of the dorsal, but not the ventral, hippocampus relieves neuropathic pain in rodents pdf Download Week 4 (September 29th): Molecular Endpoints Article Link: pdf download Week 5 (October 6th): SEQ Article Link: Neuronal activity-related transcription is blunted in immature compared to mature dentate granule cells pdf download Week 6 (October 20th): Electrophysiology Article Link: Group II metabotropic glutamate receptor expressing neurons in anterior cingulate cortex become sensitized after inflammatory and neuropathic pain pdf download Week 7 (October 27th): in-class test - no reading Week 8 (November 3rd): Alterations in gene expression Article Link: pdf download Week 9 (November 10th): DREADDs Article Link: pdf download Week 10 (November 17th): Optogenetics Article Link: pdf download Week 11 (November 24th): in-vivo calcium imaging Article Link: pdf download Week 12 (December 1st): TRAP Article Link: pdf download
